trends: There has been one other sighting in Immokalee
There were no other sightings in Immokalee on or around July 4th 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsIt seemed to be going slow, went straight then curved. Suddenly started going straight up till it disappeared. Today was the fourth of july. 6 people saw it with me in the sky as fireworks went off. Maybe the noises scared it off as it was probably stationed somewhere in the woods?
Summary: It seemed to be going slow, went straight then curved. Suddenly started going straight up till it disappeared
